Text.Value: What did Carrion do to you?
Promised... better life... given only death...
Where are you from?
Who is 'Carrion'?
Leave.
A ritual... jars... hidden in flesh...
I failed... died too quickly...
Carrion...
Bled... hollowed... emptied... alive... was still alive...
Mystic Carrion... medium... monster... liar...
What do you know about Mystic Carrion?
What lies did Carrion tell?
Who killed you?
How did you get here?
Beggar... vagrant... scum... my name was Taron...
*The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*
*The corpse regards you lifelessly.*
Who are you?
Why didn't he kill you straight away?
Carrion... offered shelter... safety... I was desperate...
*The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*
Tumbledown... long ago... no home now...

Synopsis: Speak with dead dialog with a dead adventurer in the ancient lair
